name: INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE: SHIPPING INFORMATION AND 10% DISCOUNT CODE
description: WE HAVE INSTITUTED A PERMANENT 10% DISCOUNT FOR INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS. IF YOU ARE NOT LOCATED IN THE USA, SIMPLY ENTER THE CODE EXPORT AT CHECKOUT FOR 10% OFF YOUR ORDER (NOT INCLUDING SHIPPING). IF YOU ARE NOT AN INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMER AND YOU USE THIS CODE, YOUR ORDER WILL BE REFUNDED. Additionally, international shipping rates are generally very accurate for orders of 1 - 3 items, but larger orders may result in a SHIPPING OVERCHARGE. If this happens, we will REFUND YOU THE DIFFERENCE when we process your order and figure out what the excess was. This is the easiest way for us to operate, thanks for understanding.

name: PERSONAL CASSETTE SALE (UPDATED 12/18)
description:
Here is a list of things I am getting rid of from my personal collection. Use the drop down menu to purchase, feel free to mail me with any questions. If the price listed is way below the typical asking price for a "first press", then please assume that the copy comes from a re-press.

Prices on remaining items will be reduced once a week until I move.

Only 1 of each.

Prices on remaining items will be reduced once a week until I move.

Only 1 of each.

name: DISTRO CASSETTES (SALE, UPDATED 12/18)
description:
This is the section where you can find distro tapes that are no longer NEW ARRIVALS.

We have moved ALL older tapes into this section, meaning you will find titles from many featured labels as well as miscellaneous cassettes.

name: NEW RELEASES
description: New releases located in this section.

name: NEW RELEASE PACK
description: Here you can purchase all 3 new releases for a reduced price. This will ship once the Lluvia LP is in hand in mid-December. European customers can order from Mordgrimm or Eisenwald. Canadian customers please contact us for an accurate shipping quote. Photograph by astareth

name: Death Fortress - Mirror Into Eternity CS
description: Over thirty minutes of relentless black metal from DEATH FORTRESS, set to be released on cassette in November. This marks the last solo attack before the debut LP, which will feature a full lineup for the first time... ----- "It is with great pride that I present to you the 'MIRROR INTO ETERNITY' EP. I hope that these songs will possess you the same way that they have possessed me over the last eight months. I am also proud to announce that DEATH FORTRESS is no longer a solitary operation. I have joined forces with S. Eldridge (FUNEBRARUM, DISMA) who has assumed battery and T. Warrior (DETHRONED EMPEROR) who has assumed bass and vocals. We have completed writing the first full-scale sonic deluge and have already commenced recording. We will continue to work closely with our allies at FALLEN EMPIRE RECORDS in producing a monumental and pulverizing album." - J. Aversario, Sep. 2013 ----- Audio sample: Full stream via Bandcamp Pre-order in Germany via Eisenwald Pre-order in The UK via Mordgrimm Pre-order in Greece via Underground Soundscapes Photographs by astareth

name: Endlichkeit - Endlichkeit I–II CS
description: The debut release from ENDLICHKEIT. Two tracks of hazy black metal, reminiscent of early VELVET CACOON and certain tracks by ILDJARN-NIDHOGG. Audio sample: Full stream and download Order in Europe via Underground Soundscapes

name: Lluvia - Eternidad Solemne Promo CS
description: Promo CS of material from the second Lluvia LP.

name: Lluvia - Premonicion De Guerra LP
description: NOW SHIPPING! ----- Forged in blood over the past two years, PREMONICION DE GUERRA is the debut album from LLUVIA, an entity which has emerged from the ashes of THE RAIN IN ENDLESS FALL. A declaration of intent through 46 minutes of vast, captivating black metal. 333 copies on grey/black 180 gram vinyl and housed in a gatefold jacket with an insert. Audio sample: "Espada De Bronce" "Viento Helado / Sombras Imperiales" Mastered at Darksound Studios by Anil Carrier Pre-order in The UK via Mordgrimm Pre-order in Germany via Eisenwald Photographs by astareth

name: Lluvia - Premonicion De Guerra CS
description: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. ORDERS CONTAINING THIS ITEM WILL SHIP ONCE THE CS IS IN STOCK. ----- Limited tape version of the Lluvia album, in an edition of 200 copies. The pro-duplicated release comes in an A5 box with hand embossed cover, together with a 12 page A5 booklet. Released by Mordgrimm. ----- Forged in blood over the past two years, PREMONICION DE GUERRA is the debut album from LLUVIA, an entity which has emerged from the ashes of THE RAIN IN ENDLESS FALL. A declaration of intent through 46 minutes of vast, captivating black metal. Audio sample: "Espada De Bronce" "Viento Helado / Sombras Imperiales" Mastered at Darksound Studios by Anil Carrier Order in The UK via Mordgrimm

name: Lluvia T-Shirt
description: Lluvia T-Shirt. Only 4 of each size.

name: Tukaaria - Raw to the Rapine LP
description: NOW SHIPPING! Vinyl version of this essential album from 2011. An impossible fusion of carnality and atmosphere. Audio sample: Full stream via Bandcamp Pre-order in The UK via Mordgrimm Pre-order in Germany via Eisenwald Photographs by astareth

name: FALLEN EMPIRE
description: This section is for titles that have been released under the Fallen Empire banner

name: Arnaut Pavle - S/T CS
description: Originally released in early 2013 on VLAD TAPES, the debut demo from ARNAUT PAVLE has been favorably compared to the works of early DARKTHRONE and CRAFT with added punk sensibilities. We are proud to re-issue this now sold out demo on cassette and announce that the debut full-length album will be released on LP and Bandcamp via Fallen Empire Records sometime in 2014. Audio sample: Full stream @ Bandcamp Order in Europe via Underground Soundscapes

name: Blut der Nacht - Sargnagel 7"
description: With 3 songs totaling just over 10 minutes, BLUT DER NACHT strips down the sound from their first demo, resulting in a recording that is even more raw and blown out. This may very well be their last recording, only time will tell for now. Limited to 300 copies on black vinyl. Audio sample: Full stream European customers are encouraged to order from Mordgrimm

name: Death Fortress - Pulling Ancient Stone CS
description: We bought back from copies of this superb black metal demo from Mordgrimm. Pulverizing black metal from New Jersey, particularly reminiscent of 'Purity' era Hate Forest. Audio sample: Full stream

name: Din of Awakening - Demo II CS
description: RE-STOCK! Second demo from Din of Awakening, showcases a different style compared to their first demo. A raw and blown out recording with black and death metal influences. Limited to 200 copies on cassette, co-released with Mordgrimm. Debut demo available for purchase here: "Din of Awakening - S/T CS" Available for order in the EU from Mordgrimm Full stream: Din of Awakening - Demo II

name: Kuxan Suum - S/T LP
description: This LP features the tracks "Kinich Ahau" and "Principle of Harmonic Resonance" on vinyl format for the first time. The audio is re-mastered and much improved compared to the cassette versions that appeared previously. Perhaps the most abstract band of the Black Twilight Circle, they combine elements of black metal, noise and ambient to create auditory hallucinations. Limited to 500 copies on 180g vinyl. All black. Available for pre-order in the EU from Mordgrimm Full stream: Kuxan Suum - S/T

name: Lustre - Night Spirit LP
description: ALL REMAINING COPIES HAVE CORNER DAMAGE ON ONE OF THE CORNERS, SO I HAVE REDUCED THE PRICE UNTIL THEY ARE GONE EUROPEAN CUSTOMERS VISIT EISENWALD (GER) TO ORDER Lustre is a Naturalistic Black Metal act from Sweden in the purest form. Hypnotic ambient black metal, evocative of the strength from Summoning and Burzum - Filosofem. Hypnotic ambient black metal from Sweden. "Ever since "Night Spirit" came into form there's been a vision of the album in vinyl format, and now the vision has come true. A mystical tale in two parts, accompanied by music of the night." - Lustre/Nachtzeit Limited to 350 copies on translucent blue vinyl with a large A1 poster. Co-released between Fallen Empire Records and Eisenwald. Audio sample: Full stream Issued under license from ATMF http://www.atmf.net/

name: Trist - Zrcadlení melancholie LP
description: EUROPEAN CUSTOMERS VISIT EISENWALD (GER) TO ORDER Now on vinyl for the first time, ZRCADLENÍ MELANCHOLIE is one of the most raw and pure expressions of melancholy that has ever been recorded. Originally released in 2007, it is now widely regarded as a masterpiece of the genre; a true gem hidden among the coal. Released to 500 hand-numbered copies with exclusive artwork by Kim Carlsson of Hypothermia and layout by Ensamvarg Design. Co-released between Fallen Empire Records and Eisenwald. Audio sample: Full stream SORRY INTERNATIONAL PEOPLE (ESPECIALLY CANADIANS), THE SHIPPING PRICE REFLECTS THE NEW RATES AS OF JANUARY 27TH.

name: Trist / Nuit Noire - Split 7"
description: Split 7" from these two enigmatic European acts, originally planned for release on the Unjoy imprint. Trist's cut is titled "Nostalgie III" and is the final song from the Nostalgie sessions. Nuit Noire comes full force with two tracks of faerie worshiping black punk like only they can do. Limited to 500 copies on 7" vinyl. All black. Available in the EU from Mordgrimm Full stream: Trist / Nuit Noire - Split

name: Xothist - S/T LP
description: Harrowing and disorienting ambient black metal. Originally released in 2011 to 46 copies on cassette by BLEAK ENVIRONMENT, the debut offering from XOTHIST showcases mechanical black ambient that appears to draw influence from acts such as DARKSPACE and XASTHUR, while creating a feel that is completely unique unto itself. Re-mastered in 2012 by Xothist specifically for this release. Limited to 330 copies. Comes with a patch until it doesn't. Art and layout by A.M. of Bleak Environment Audio sample: Full album stream and download ORDER IN THE UK VIA MORDGRIMM ORDER IN GERMANY VIA EISENWALD

name: DISTRO
description: This section is for titles released on other labels being distributed by Fallen Empire

name: Acrimonious - Purulence LP
description: The debut full-length from this Greek black metal offensive. Reminiscent of Leviathan with similar vocals, but more rapidly progressing song structure. 180gram heavy black vinyl limited to 400 copies. Imported from Poland by Agonia Records. Audio sample: "Spirit's Eclipse"

name: Acrimonious - Sunyata LP
description: "Typhonian occult metallers ACRIMONIOUS return with with a new rock-influenced and ritual-driven black metal release, wrapped in a classic heavy metal feeling." - Agonia records Comes with a huge booklet with artwork and words similar to the cover. Imported from Poland by Agonia Records. Audio sample: "Glory Crowned Son of the Thousand Petalled Lotus"

name: Ancient Records - Demo compilation Part.1 LP
description:
"Two long Black Metal tracks in the vein of Reverorum ib Malacht." - Ancient Records

Imported from Sweden by Ancient Records.

NO SAMPLES.

name: Angantyr - Forvist 2xLP
description: One of my most anticipated albums of the year, Angantyr returns with another album full the majestic, evocative riffing that makes them so memorable. A must for anybody who is a fan of their other works. Imported from Germany by Northern Silence Productions. Audio sample: "Skovens Egne Våben"

name: Aosoth - Ashes of Angels LP
description: "AOSOTH's 2nd album re-released for the first time on black vinyl." - Agonia Records Imported from Poland by Agonia Records. Audio sample: "Embrace and Enlightenment"

name: Blodarv - Soulcollector LP + 7"
description: Raw and atmospheric Danish black metal that reminds me a bit of Monarque at times. Imported from Germany by Northern Silence Productions. Audio sample: "Langt væk fra Livet..."

name: Bloodline - Hate Procession LP
description: 2009 full-length, now released on vinyl. Brooding and misanthropic. Imported from Germany by World Terror Committee. Audio sample: "Order Of The Parasite"

name: Celestial Bloodshed - The Serpent's Kiss 7"
description: Single sided 7" with etched B side. Imported from Norway by Terratur Possesions. Audio sample: "The Serpent's Kiss" (live)

name: Chambre Froide - Des Alliés et des Rats 7"
description:
2011 EP from this French raw black metal act. Recommended.

Imported from France by Ravensdöm.

name: Forbidden Citadel of Spirits / Satanize - Split 7"
description:
"The long time sold-out tape now in vinyl format, as originally intended. Raw, profane, instinctive Black Metal. Limited handnumbered edition." - Bubonic Productions

Imported from Portugal by Bubonic Productions.

name: Forgotten Tomb - Obscura Arcana Mortis 10" LP
description: Forgotten Tomb's earliest demo material, a showcase of a raw and aggressive sound, while still carrying the uniqueness that makes Forgotten Tomb stand out. Less melody than their later releases, and more focus on tremolo picking and strict blasts. LP imported from Poland by Agonia Records. Audio sample: "Obscura Arcana Mortis"

name: Harassor - Night On My Side: The Bruno Sessions LP
description: Vinyl version of the follow up album to "Night On My Side". Filthy black punk with distorted vocals. All covers smeared in blood. Imported from California by Rising Beast Recordings Audio sample: FULL STREAM

name: Insalubre / Marbh - Split 7"
description:
Two cuts of distant and mournful black metal from Portugal.

Imported from Portugal by Bubonic Productions. Co-released by Discipline and Titan Woods.

name: InThyFlesh / Insalubre - Split 7"
description:
"In 2008, May 24th, both bands presented one unreleased track at a live ritual (O Culto à Morte) played along with Dolentia, Tumulum and Inverno Eterno. Five years passed and I'm proud to present both tracks, recorded with rehearsal sound, in a limited 7". Limited handnumbered edition, dedicated to its owner." - Bubonic Productions

Imported from Portugal by Bubonic Productions.

name: Kaos Sacramentum - Förneka Den Fysiska Lekamen LP
description: "LP version of the demo compilation." - Ancient Records Imported from Sweden by Ancient Records. Audio sample: "Holy Light, Illuminate"

name: Lake of Blood - As Time and Tide Erodes Stone LP
description: Black metal from California that easily sounds as if it could be a European band. 32 minutes of blasting black metal interjected by slower melodic passages. Imported from California by The Flenser. Audio sample: Full stream

name: Legions of Astaroth - Rites of Somatic Death 2xLP
description: "Nearing four years in the making, the debut full-length of Legions Of Astaroth has come to fruition. Rites of Somatic Death is a compelling work of atmospheric, dynamic, and inspired black metal. The album has been created and refined in such a manner that it will present the listener with a monumental work of extreme music. Double LP release presented in a gatefold jacket." LP released by Baneful Genesis Records. Audio sample: "Ritual of Somatic Death"

name: Lord Time - Forgotten Future LP
description: Lord Time returns with this vinyl release of the 2010 demo "Forgotten Future", spewing forth some of the sickest, bleakest, most skin-crawling black metal you'll head, encased in a heavy stock folding sleeve. Black one-sided vinyl with a deluxe letter-pressed parchment stock insert, painted and hand-numbered with the artist's own blood. Limited pressing of 200. LP released by Prison Tatt Records Audio sample: "Second Punishment"

name: Lustre - Wonder LP
description: Forthcoming album from Sweden's Lustre, sure to please fans of his hypnotic brand of ambient black metal. "Limited vinyl edition, released under license from Nordvis. - solid full-colour sleeve, printed on reverse board - alternate design compared to the CD version. - black paper inner-sleeve with protective layer - large poster on uncoated (rough) paperstock, aprox 30 x 85cm - Limited to 200 copies forest green coloured vinyl and 150 copies on black vinyl" - Eisenwald Imported from Germany by Eisenwald. Audio samples: "Green Worlds" Album trailer

name: Malfeitor - Incubus LP
description: Black metal delivered with strong production, strong riff writing and song progression that is clear and delivers a very staple later 90's black metal sound. Limited to 500 copies, with gatefold jacket. Imported from Poland by Agonia Records. Audio sample: "Incubus"

name: Meth Drinker / Moloch - Split LP
description: "Two of worlds filthiest bands meet. Pure sludge armageddon. New Zealand meets Nottingham." - Crucificados Pelo Sistema Imported from Germany by Crucificados Pelo Sistema. Audio sample: "2 Minutes Hate"

name: Moloch - Depressive Black Metal Plague LP
description: "Depressive Black Metal Plague consists of four “Plagues”, three previously released and one additional titled “Plague IV” on single-sided LP with silkscreened sleeve design. As with anything Moloch the listener should expect raw minimalist sonic calamity with a very large emphasis on feelings of desertion and frustration." LP released by Prison Tatt Records. Audio sample: "Depressive Visionen eines sterbenden Horizonts" from Isolation der Essenz.

name: Nefarious - The Universal Wrath LP
description: Nefarious first came to the attention of many from their split 7" with HORNA, who I believe they outdid on that release. Here is the debut album from Hungary's NEFARIOUS, summoning forth black metal that seamlessly mixes atmosphere and intensity. Comes with a poster. Imported from Germany by Deviant Records. Audio sample: "The Universal Wrath"

name: Obolus - Lament MLP
description: One of my favorite recordings from 2012. Mesmerizing black metal from the USA, simply a must listen. Imported from California by The Flenser. Audio sample: "Hatred"

name: Pest - Black Oath c/w Morbid Revelation 7"
description:
Prelude to their forthcoming LP on Agonia Records, Pest delivers two brand new tracks exclusive to this 7".

Imported from Poland by Agonia.

name: Pombagira - Iconoclast Dream LP
description: "Fuzz drenched psychedelic heaviness, alternating between the intense heaviness of Acid King/Electric Wizard/Sunn O))), and a mellower 60s style psych trip; with Satan on vocals." - Mordgrimm 180gm Black Vinyl, Full Colour Sleeve and Inner Bag. Limited to 500 and co-released with Black Axis Records. Imported from the UK by Mordgrimm. Audio sample: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=20KXQHkDaKc - rough handheld live recording highlighting a portion of "Iconoclast Dream" Available in the EU at http://mordgrimm.bigcartel.com/ NOTE: LPs came to me shrink wrapped. Before shipping, LPs WILL be removed from the jacket and inner sleeve to prevent seam splits of any kind unless otherwise specified.

name: Serpent Omega - S/T LP
description: "Now available, the debut album from Swedish band Serpent Omega. Featuring former members of bands such as Abuse and Burnher, they meld sludge, doom and black crust, evoking the Great Serpent with monstrous rituals." - Mordgrimm Housed in a gatefold jacket with matte finish and spot gloss on metallic gold plus a full color insert. Imported from The UK by Mordgrimm. Audio sample: Full stream

name: Summum - Orchestra Mali, et Devotionem 7"
description: "A EP of chaotic anti-musick." - Ancient Records Imported from Sweden by Ancient Records. Audio sample: "Orchestra Mali, et Devotionem"

name: URKAOS - Urkaos II LP
description: "A demo atmoshpheric keyboards. NO Black Metal on this release." - Ancient Records Imported from Sweden by Ancient Records. Audio sample: "Urkaos II" excerpts

name: White Medal / Instinct - Further into the Arms of Nature / Ger Til Tyne 7"
description: "A split that has been planned for years; originally having been recorded once for a rip off cunt and ultimately cancelled, with the original recordings from both projects being issued elsewhere, it looked like it wasn't going to materialise. In the spirit of perseverance; new songs were recorded and are now seeing the light of day on Legion Blotan. If tha wants job done reight, de it thyssen. Two sides of Ancient Heathen Black Metal from the North and from the South of the land now known as England. Limited to 250 copies on black vinyl with double sided printed sleeves." - Legion Blotan Imported from The UK by Legion Blotan. Audio sample: Audio excerpts

name: Wings of War - Prepare For War 7"
description: Ugly, lo-fi black thrash with powerful vocals guaranteed to have you banging your head. Imported from the UK by Legion Blotan Audio sample: "Infernal Wings of War"
